type.markdownDescription:
### `apoli:fire_projectile`
Fires one or more projectiles upon pressing the specified Key.
## Power Type
Power Types are what grants functionality to your origins! Each power has a type, specified with a type field in the JSON. Which type a power is defines which other fields it requires and supports.

[Power Type Documentation](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/json/power/)

entity_type.description: The ID of the entity type that will be fired.

cooldown.description: Interval of ticks this power needs to recharge before the power can be triggered again.

hud_render.description: Determines how the cooldown of this power is visualized on the HUD.

count.description: The amount of projectiles to fire each use.

interval.description: Determines the interval for firing multiple projectiles consecutively (in ticks). If set to 0, it will fire all the projectiles at the same tick.

start_delay.description: Determines how long the start of the firing process is delayed (in ticks).

speed.description: The speed applied to the fired projectile.

divergence.description: How much each projectile fired is affected by random spread.

sound.description: If set, the sound with this ID will be played when the power is used.

key.description: Which active key this power should respond to. If none is specified, this power will use the primary active power key (by default G).
